description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) information disclosure vulnerability (CVE-2024-21423), it is recommended to update to the latest version of Microsoft Edge.

1. Visit the Microsoft Update Catalog at the following link: [Update Catalog](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB21423).

2. Download the update package for Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 122.0.2365.52.

3. Follow the installation instructions provided with the update package to complete the installation.

**Details**:
- This update resolves information disclosure vulnerabilities, ensuring that your browser can protect against unauthorized access to restricted information. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your current installation of Microsoft Edge is from the Chromium-based family. 
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
